channel.title: webshop on no mad blog
channel.description: Recent content in webshop on no mad blog

item.title: Open Source Webshop
item.description: What’s this about? It’s been a while, but I’ve not been idle. :) In fact, we’ve made some pretty awesome progress on the Slow Food front. I believe it’s the first post about Slow Food, so let me introduce it briefly: Slow Food is an NGO that fights towards sustainable food systems. I love both food and good causes, so I’ve been engaged for quite some years now… six I believe?
